actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Adjustment Act, as amended and reenacted by the Agricultural Marketing Agreement Act of 1937, to subject imported tomatoes to the same pack of container restrictions as are applicable to domestic tomatoes.

summary.text: Amends the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1933, as amended by the Agricultural Marketing Agreement Act of 1937, to subject imported tomatoes to the same packing restrictions that apply to domestic tomatoes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Adjustment Act, as amended and reenacted by the Agricultural Marketing Agreement Act of 1937, to subject imported tomatoes to the same pack of container restrictions as are applicable to domestic tomatoes.
